sources.title: Axe Me Another (1934)
sources.description: Pierre Bluto, running a logging camp, has thrown Olive into the river because he didn't like her spinach. Popeye rescues her and proceeds to beat Bluto in a lumberjack contest. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/axe-me-another-1934/

metadata.Plot: Pierre Bluto, running a logging camp, has thrown Olive into the river because he didn't like her spinach. Popeye rescues her and proceeds to beat Bluto in a lumberjack contest.
metadata.Actors: Charles Carver, William Costello, William Pennell
